items.name: See a Broadway Show
items.description: Visiting the Great White Way means attending one of 41 large theaters concentrated near Times Square.

items.name: Chill out on The High Line
items.description: The High Line is a 1.45-mile-long elevated linear park, greenway and rail trail created on a former New York Central Railroad

items.name: Laugh at the Upright Citizens Brigade Theatre
items.description: The Upright Citizens Brigade Theatre is an American improvisational theatre and training center

items.name: Museum of Modern Art
items.description: The museum develops and collects modernist art, and is often identified as one of the most influential museums of modern art.

items.name: Nitehawk Cinema
items.description: Movies screened with global fare & craft cocktails served at patrons' seats

items.name: Lola Star's Dreamland Roller Disco
items.description: Fashion your best pop star costume and head to Lola Starâ€™s themed roller-skating parties.

items.name: Deno's Wonder Wheel Amusement Park
items.description: A Coney Island go-to since 1920 that boasts sweet oceanside views.

items.name: Tenement Museum
items.description: A series of restored tenement apartments on the Lower East Side that show visitors the day-to-day lives of past immigrant tenants.

items.name: American Museum of Natural History
items.description: An expertly curated, 149-year-old institution that fills visitors of all ages with a curiosity about the universe.
